ComicInfo.Tags: Richard Burton,Mrs. Popnecker,Frankenstein's Monster,Pincus Popnecker,Elizabeth Taylor,Satan,Dracula,Herbert Popnecker
ComicInfo.Title: Herbie Goes to the Devil!; Strange Beast; The Face in the Portrait; Dreams of Glory
ComicInfo.Summary: Satan is getting fewer souls every year so he boasts that he will deliver a randomly chosen one: Herbie's. Herbie agrees to a deal with the Devil to help his dad, and after consultation on contracts, Herbie reluctantly agrees to go to Hades. Hades would never be the same!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
